name: 3.4.1.06. Crop Failure (Settlement)

cf.path: Map Notes#/CF_SEP/PFRPG - Kingdom Building - GM Version

content: Pests, blight, and weather ruin the harvest in the settlement's hex and all adjacent hexes. Attempt two Stability checks. If both succeed, the problem is fixed before your kingdom takes any penalties from the event. If only one succeeds, affected farms reduce Consumption by 1 (instead of the normal reduction) in the next Upkeep phase. If neither succeeds, affected farms do not reduce Consumption at all in the next Upkeep phase.
